import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Shoplist=()=>{const[shops,setShops]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchShops=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/shops');setShops(response.data);// Store fetched data in state
}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching shops:',error);}};fetchShops();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shop List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap'},children:shops.map(shop=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ccc',margin:'10px',padding:'10px',width:'200px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:shop.image,alt:shop.name,style:{width:'150px',height:'150px',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:shop.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Owner: ",shop.owner]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Contact: ",shop.contact]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Address: ",shop.address]})]},shop._id))})]});};export default Shoplist;
